title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple CLI & REST API with GPU/CPU fallback.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models in 5 lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers (with proxy) to run local LLMs.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter giving chat, generate, embed, tool-calling via Ollama.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-like web UI for any Ollama model; plugins, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j – Java Ollama client
summary: Idiomatic Java/Kotlin SDK with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb – Ruby gem
summary: Lightweight Ruby client for chat & completions; ships with CLI.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Interactive command-line REPL with syntax highlighting & conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot – VS Code extension
summary: Bring local Ollama models into VS Code inline suggestions & chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks adding WebUI, Open-WebUI, or LiteLLM proxy.

title: ollama-litellm – OpenAI-compatible gateway
summary: LiteLLM proxy exposing Ollama models under OpenAI API format; load-balance & keys.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, RAG, fine-tune, LangGraph, Autogen.

title: ollama-gpt-crawler
summary: Scrape any site, feed pages to Ollama for summarization or Q&A in one command.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers users using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server streaming Ollama replies into threads.

title: ollama-rag – Streamlit demo
summary: Upload PDFs → Chroma embeddings → chat with local Llama 3 via Ollama in Streamlit.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Tutorial + scripts to fine-tune Mistral-7b, convert to GGUF and serve with Ollama.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community registry of custom Modelfiles (CodeLlama-70B-Instruct, SQLCoder, etc.).

title: r/ollama – Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and feature requests.
